title: Plan Well Abandonment
description: An engineer prepares a plug and abandonment (P&A) plan for an old, non-producing well to ensure it is sealed safely and permanently.

tasks.description: Retrieve the wellbore diagram and historical records for the target well.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete history and schematic of the well are available.

tasks.description: Identify all zones that require isolation and design the cement plugs needed to create permanent barriers.
tasks.expected_outcome: A P&A plan with correctly placed cement plugs is designed.

tasks.description: Estimate the total cost and duration of the P&A operation and submit the plan for regulatory approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: A cost estimate and a regulatory submission package are generated.
